attributes.action: Lockdown breaches by Government officials must be treated as Gross Misconduct
attributes.additional_details: For parity, disclosure, transparency and infection control.
attributes.background: Any actions by Civil Servants or other Government officials to breach Lockdown rules should be treated as gross misconduct and should lead to dismissal.
